website_summaries.verdict: A perfect way to illuminate your work space in the garage or laundry room.
pros: The AntLux lights produce a bright, natural light effect
It may be too bright for some spaces, but helps the laundry room when you need to look for stains on clothes, or over your workbench in the garage
The AntLux lights are an energy efficient alternative to the florescent lights we normally have in these work spaces
We loved that these lights came with plastic clips to hold the wires neatly in place
The light strips themselves were lightweight and easy to install
cons: There is no cover to hide the wires, so they look a little messy
There is a split second delay when turning the lights on that is hardly noticeable at all

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Swapped out several 8’ high output fluorescent for these used one 4’ to replace a double 8’ fixture My electric meter used to go around like crazy When all the garage lights were on Now it hardly moves with brighter lighting
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use - bright light output
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright, one connector wire did not pass power to later units in the chain, but their was an extra included anyway. I used 4 to replace 4 40watt tubes in my fixture, and removed the extra layer of diffusion that capped the new tubes so the the light would not be muted... all went well and the light is brighter, and still saves about 60 Watts over the Floresecent setup
customer_reviews.author: KenB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for 8x13 ft shed
customer_reviews.text: Really bright! I bought this for my 8x13 ft shed. I put 3 on one side, 3 on the other, and they provide what I call "hospital lighting." They are lightweight, but seem to be solid once mounted. Plenty of hardware and cords, whether you want them touching in rows, turning corners, or individually placed. I did have to snap the covers on for two where they were off in a few places, but snapped right where they belong and did not move afterward.
customer_reviews.author: James Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and service.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are really good and bright, but I had one fixture that had a bad light strip. I contacted Antlux and they promptly replied and are sending a replacement fixture. In my book Customer Service is what makes or breaks a company besides a good product. This company has both.
customer_reviews.author: khog

customer_reviews.title: Wow powerful lights
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought these years ago!!! Look at the photos to see the difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: Serge

customer_reviews.title: Brighter and less electricity use
customer_reviews.text: Well made and BRIGHT. Wanted the set of 4 to install in garage and basement. Son restores 1980s cars&truckd. He had some flouredcent lights but after replacing one with the Anthem, he took all 4 to cover the 2 bays. Install easy and I don’t get as snnoyed when he leaves them on overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Seller backs product when product arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: If you use X10 remotes, you may not like this product. It generates a lot of noise at zero crossover of the AC line. Smart Leviton switches will stall their response until the line is clear.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Clause

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and very bright.
customer_reviews.text: very bright with easy to install fixture setup. bought four of these and really has brightened up the areas where they were installed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do what you need them to do
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lighting for filmmaking. Not too worried about them breaking, they're super light weight and can take a great deal of damage before they stop working. Plus if you are able to break them accidentally, they're super inexpensive so easy to replace!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to set up a work shop in my garage. The lights are bright and they are easy to install. I am very happy with them. I have been trying to think of more uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Bring sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my new shop. Very simple to hang. LOT’S of light - I specifically wanted the 5000k color lights to create a daylight look. Low power usage - and dimmable. Wired them with a Lutron switch so I can turn on/off from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: James B Mynaugh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bright light...
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Definitely recommend. Good quality. Nice bright light...
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: PLUS: Quick delivery and great price. Easy to install and provide lots of light. MINUS: Installed these in my workshop, Completely interferes with the reception of the radio I have in the shop. Overall, good product. RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Quality is decent for the money. The chains that come with it are useless, they pull apart from the weight of the light. The 9000 lumens is not very bright, would be fine for a low ceiling application but not so great for 12' ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Completely lights up my 20 x 20 Garage/GYM. Best investment for light fixtures!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they are bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Replaced my non convertible T12 shop lights with these and couldn't be happier. All products showed up intact with no broken parts. I like how these have metal housings instead of plastic. I very much recommend these. Be sure to map out everything carefully before mounting
customer_reviews.author: Kenson Alan Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and plenty bright. I’ll be ordering more in the future for some other projects I have.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The lights exceeded expectations. Tons of attachment, lots of ways to configure. Would buy again, although these lights last so long i probably won't need to do that.
customer_reviews.author: David Pontius

customer_reviews.title: works we;ll
customer_reviews.text: perfect lighting for basement and garage pigtails could be a little longer great product
customer_reviews.author: steve guercia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight packaging and light weight of product makes for poor shipping results.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging completely inadequate for shipping. All 6 strips bent, mangled and unusable. They look descent and none of the lenses appeared to be broken which is the only reason I am not completely dismissing them.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: Work great missing a package of hardware so I can not hang one light
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: LED light
customer_reviews.text: I used the lights to replace my outdoor and garage light they were better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery & Great Product Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product delivered was exactly what was expected. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mary VanOostenbrugge

product_meta.title: AntLux 80W 4ft LED Shop Light Fixture for Garage, 4 Lamps 9600 Lumens, 5000K, Utility Led High Bay Light, 250W Fluorescent Equivalent, Plug in with on/Off Switch, 4 Pack
feature_bullets: ✔ UP TO 75% ENERGY SAVING- 80 watts with 9600 lumens, which is equivalent to a 250W fluorescent fixture. 50000hrs lifespan. Environment protection without UV or IR radiation. ETL certified.

✔ 80W LED LIGHT FIXTURE: Super bright and lightweight structure design with US plug, safety and reliability. 4-lamp led light uses top brand led driver with high precision and high efficiency((4 Bulbs Included). NO extra bulbs needed.

✔ EASY INSTALLATION: Plug in and on/off switch design with 60 inch cord. Both suspended or surface mount are available, mounting hardware and hanging chains are included. Comes with a detailed installation sheet to make ceiling light fixture install easily.

✔ WIDE APPLICATION - Our 4' led shop light fixture are ideal for garages, workshop, basement, workbench, utility rooms, storage rooms, barn, equipment rooms, work area, auto shops, small warehouse and replacing traditional fluorescent light versions.
✔ 5 YEAR WARRANTY - ANTLUX's 5-Year Warranty means we got you covered! Easy and fast replacement is offered if any quality issue about our 4ft led garage lights.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
